function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tropical deforestation and wildlife trade increasing the risk of future zoonosis outbreaks","Impact":"Potential emergence of infectious diseases with significant public health and economic impacts","Mitigation":"Implementing policies to prevent deforestation and limit wildlife trade, promoting sustainable land use and intact ecosystems","Technologies":"Satellite monitoring, blockchain technology for supply chain transparency, conservation drones","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, conservation organizations","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, conservation groups"},{"Description":"Economic growth contributing to biodiversity loss and environmental degradation","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity, environmental degradation, climate change, and spread of invasive species leading to increased risk of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable land use policies, promoting biodiversity conservation, reducing resource extraction, and limiting CO2 emissions","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, sustainable agriculture practices, green infrastructure","People":"Policy makers, environmental organizations, conservationists","Owner":"Governments, environmental agencies, international cooperation"},{"Description":"Prioritization of GDP over human well-being and healthy environment","Impact":"Neglect of sustainable development goals, continued environmental degradation, and failure to address societal well-being","Mitigation":"Shifting societal priorities from GDP to human well-being, implementing sustainable policies, and promoting a healthy environment","Technologies":"Social impact assessment tools, sustainable development indicators, green economy measures","People":"Policy makers, sustainability advocates, social and environmental organizations","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, civil society"}]}
